job_description:
Company Description
Cheddar makes it easy to get paid by friends, send money and earn cashback when you shop at retailers across the UK. We're rewriting the rules of moving money and getting paid.
As part of our growing team, you'll create services that will deliver tangible benefits to millions. Collaborating with some of the brightest minds in tech, you'll help launch, scale and continually evolve our suite of payment tools to create real value and exceed customer expectations.
We are a remote-first company. That means we encourage you to work from anywhere that suits you. We still believe human contact makes working together better (and more fun!). As a team, we gather in real life multiple times a year to align the team and work on hard problems together.

Job Description
As an engineer at Cheddar, you’ll wear many hats and be responsible for large parts of our tech infrastructure. Your future colleagues have extensive experience of scaling software at some of the globe's most disruptive tech unicorns, and we are aiming to deliver a platform used by millions across UK, Europe and eventually global.
We're building our platform on proven and reliable software, using:
Ruby on Rails (main application)
Go (auxiliary services)
Dart / Flutter (mobile application)
PostgreSQL
BigQuery
We don't believe in breaking up our platform into thousands of services but are instead creating boundaries where it makes sense. Security is very important of course, since we are dealing with banks and money. So we need to do things right.
We rely on Google Cloud for deploying our infrastructure so we can focus on what makes us unique. We automate where possible to achieve the scale we are aiming for.
Our approach to engineering is;
Build a reliable, no-nonsense tech stack
Plenty of autonomy so you can make the right decision
We move fast and believe everything is solvable
Building an experienced team that is committed to learning and self-motivated
Build a high-potential product that can grow to millions of users
As a Cheddar Engineer, you will:
Implement product features in Rails
Work on our integration with banks to ensure money is moved around smoothly
Design data models for our Postgres database
Create administrative tools to fight fraud and abuse
Have a front-row seat in forming the direction of the Cheddar product

Qualifications
We’re looking for talented people who;
Know Ruby, Python, JavaScript, Go, Dart or comparable languages
Have experience designing and shipping software into production
Are able to effectively communicate their ideas and share their knowledge with others
Like to learn new things and can get up to speed on new concepts quickly (hope you enjoy reading banking API documentation!)
Are self-motivated and know to work independently
Strong knowledge of SQL and how to design a scalable database schema
Other experience that is nice to have:
Knowledge of Protocol Buffers
Experience working in a fast-paced startup environment
Experience developing mobile applications
Experience developing front-end applications
Experience with Docker, Google Cloud, Terraform and other cloud-native tooling
Additional Information
Let's take a minute and talk about the perks:
Competitive salary
Meaningful equity in the organisation
Latest MacBook Pro
Flexible vacation policy ✈️
Remote first work
Company meetups
Regular socials
Development courses
The list goes on
We are strong supporters of diversity and inclusion, practicing what we preach. We pride ourselves in having a diverse team with a 'remote by default' way of working that further allows us to hire the best talent according to aptitude.
We openly welcome all identities and backgrounds.
pros: ["I have never worked with so many supportive, intelligent, and welcoming people. I have only worked here a month, but I can already tell that I will want to work here a very long time. Starting a new job remotely is challenging, but it has been smooth here because of the organization within this company and the willingness among everyone to help. I feel like there is so much for me to learn, so much room to grow, and each day is so different than the next - which I love. Overall, this is the happiest I've ever been at a job and I know it will only get better as I get more comfortable in the role.", 'There are some great people who work here- people who are very talented and care about the quality of their work, despite working at a company that is content to put out garbage every day. The two stars are for them alone.', 'My direct team is free-thinking, ambitious, creative, and genuinely wants to see everyone succeed. My direct superior is honest and considerate and shares our frustrations with executive decisions. I have a lot of creative trust and control over the style of my scripts and videos, which makes the job genuinely so much fun when things are going well.', 'Hands-on work, always new things to learn, friendly people, upbeat environment', 'Excellent staff, great people to be around who will help you grow as a producer', 'Everyone is generally nice, flexible hybrid schedule for most employees', 'Great place to work with a passionate team of journalists who dont want to be part of a stagnant newsroom anymore. Cheddar is the first streaming business news network in the market allowing the opportunity to re-invent rundowns and tell stories in a fresh and creative way. The company makes an incredible effort to relate to viewers and explain stories and financial news in a way young (and older) people understand and cant find elsewhere.', "Cheddar is leading the market of streaming tv. The hands-on experience you get at the company is unmatched. It would be hard for you to find one person in the building that hasn't shared an idea that isn't tried at least once. No voice goes unheard."]
cons: ['The workload has been an adjustment for me.', "Basically everything else. It's impossible to find anything regarding HR or salary, there is zero communication or employee support. Management makes arbitrary decisions and cannot explain them when questioned. And by that I mean, cannot- stumbling over their words like an unprepared college student during a presentation- explain. This ship is sinking fast. Would not recommend.", "The overall mentality of the company is truly stuck in an outdated perspective on media, with no regard for what pushes digital media forward to the new generation. Its most successful asset is our team (YouTube), and the executives know it. However, they seem to be refusing to prioritize it, perhaps out of a lack of vision. Instead, when they aren't poaching our team's producers for aimless tasks, they insist on hijacking the golden goose with the blind hopes it'll produce content that they stubbornly and naively consider superior, despite analytics clearly stating otherwise. Also, our audience demographic has become shockingly limited, and I blame a series of fear-based decisions.", 'poor management, staffers overworked and underpaid, no room for promotions or growth', 'Overall direction is erratic. Inconsistent, as if they’re planning on the fly and not with a specific end goal in mind.', 'Still kind of shaking off the "start up vibes" after the company was acquired by Altice and became more corporate. Some old systems in use, but they get by.', 'Be prepared to work hard! Its a start up mentality so if your looking for an old school newsroom style - this may not be the place for you.', "It's a start-up. We all try things together for the first time."]

job_description:
Leer de organisatie kennen
This European supplier of software is specialized in developing and implementing flexible standard solutions for several specific fields. Their software is end-to-end, granting them the opportunity to fully support customers across all levels of development. In this role, you will become part of a specialized team that is responsible for developing state-of-the-art customer portals and customer journeys in order to make complex processes more accessible to any user. All software is made in-house and continuously in progress; new implementations are carried out on a regular basis. Apart from this, the company offers plenty of freedom and responsibility to show initiative, explore new opportunities and develop yourself into a committed expert.
Over de functie
As a Software Engineer, you build new, qualitative and user-friendly software. You locate bugs and know how to fix them using your expertise and experience. You mainly work with Java, SQL and Linux, always taking into account the best way to solve problems. In addition, you and your colleagues from the customer team act as the first point of contact when customers have questions or experience problems with the software. This combination of programming and customer contact allows you to become a hybrid professional, granting you the opportunity to develop into the best version of your professional self. In your role as a Software Engineer, it is therefore important that you are able to analyze problems, come up with creative solutions, make decisions and continue until you get the job done!
Jouw kwaliteitenYou think and work on graduate level (hbo)You are passionate about development and take pride in the quality of the code you deliverYou enjoy working in a teamYou are experienced in Java
De voordelenA challenging job at an ambitious and highly specialized companyRoom to grow and develop yourself into a committed expertA learning trajectory that is tailored to your ambitionsAn in-house academyThe opportunity to frequently work from homeDaily free and healthy lunchesFun activities on a regular basisThe chance to attend (or even host) expert talks
Klinkt goed?
Ben jij geïnteresseerd in bovenstaand profiel? Good Company ziet graag jouw sollicitatie tegemoet! Solliciteer via onze website op de vacature van Software Engineer.
pros: ['Group chat for all of the servers so you can usually find someone to switch shifts with you if you need to. Management is forgiving and will help you find cover. Decently busy most days.', 'They pay higher salary and you can work from home', 'I used to work here, and it was a really great time.']
cons: ["Owners hover. Lots of stairs. They still make you tip out even if you didn't make any money.", 'Sometimes workload is too much to cope with', 'Nothing up until now. All good']

job_description:
Voor de afdeling Motion Control & Robotics Engineering zoeken wij een

Software Engineer

 De functie
De functie van software engineer is een technisch uitdagende functie met zeer veel afwisselende automatiseringsprojecten. Op de afdeling Engineering Motion Control & Robotics ben je verantwoordelijk voor het engineeren van besturingssoftware voor op CodeSys gebaseerde motion control en robot systemen. Je houd je bezig met het ontwikkelen van nieuwe software, maar ook het aanpassen van al bestaande of eerder ontwikkelde software behoort tot de werkzaamheden. De werkzaamheden vinden plaats zowel bij ABI in Haarlem als op locatie voor bijvoorbeeld ondersteuning of inbedrijfname. Je maakt deel uit van een klein en professioneel team van technisch specialisten, met een grote eigen verantwoordelijk voor de uitvoering van projecten. Alle werkzaamheden worden uitgevoerd in nauw overleg met de klant en de sales engineers van ABI.

De functie-eisen
Je hebt een voltooide opleiding op minimaal HBO niveau in één van de studierichtingen: Industriële Automatisering / Mechatronica/ Elektrotechniek, met daarnaast enige jaren ervaring als software engineer met hogere PLC programmeertalen, object georiënteerd programmeren en/of PLC talen gebaseerd op IEC 61131-3 (SFC en ST), bij voorkeur CoDeSys.
Ervaring met diverse besturingssystemen (Siemens, Allen Bradley etc. of industriële robotbesturingssystemen) is een pré en je bent bereid tot het aanleren van technische vaardigheden op het gebied van motion control en robotics.
Wij zoeken iemand met een technische en commerciële instelling en de vaardigheid om op conceptueel niveau met een machinebouwer te communiceren, die beschikt over een zelfstandige en proactieve werkhouding. Een goede beheersing van de Engelse taal is een vereiste; beheersing van het Duits is een pré. Tenslotte ben je bereid om te reizen, binnen Nederland en soms in het buitenland.

Vragen over deze vacature of meteen solliciteren? Neem contact op met Jolanda de Bie via 023-5319292 of stuur een e-mail naar jdebie@abi.nl.
pros:
['Everything about this place is amazing. I have never worked for a more loving, well run company. This place knows how to take care of their employees, and make sure they know they are appreciated. The kids are great, the staff is great, and the owner is amazing!', 'Great exposure to tons of PR, SEO and marketing-related tasks', "They are currently in the process of retooling and revamping their process & procedures, especially in the wake of opening up their global offices. This means no one has time to baby sit you and walk you through everything. You can honestly scrape by and chill until deadlines arrive, because management is always busy/ too busy to make sure you're getting your work done.  

But if you go out of your way to plow through tasks and ask for more, people will QUICKLY take notice. It's a place where you can punch through your title's ceiling and really get hands on with upper management's projects. They'll let you push as hard as you can. 

Also the MD & CEO have an open door policy and are open to lunches with junior members. Take advantage!!!!"]
cons: ['None. This place is amazing!', 'Poor management\r\nCEO and MD are "letting go" of their top performers and those with unique specialties for "financial reasons"\r\nUpdate -- In fact, MD is now no longer with the company -- CEO let MD go recently.', "This isn't really the place for someone who is wet behind the ears or shy. If you don't come off as ambitious or hardworking, they'll accordingly stick you on mundane tasks."]

job_description:
Wil jij graag meehelpen met het bouwen van mooie producten? Overweeg dan deze ICT/Software Engineer stage! Bij ons krijg je alle ruimte om jezelf te ontwikkelen en mee te draaien in een dynamische organisatie.

Werkzaamheden:

Werken met PHP5, JAVA, AJAX, MySQL, Frameworks zoals Codeigniter en bootstrap.
Servers bouwen met NginX, PHP-FPM en vergelijkbare componenten.
Meedenken in het productontwikkelingsproces met designers en communicatiemedewerkers.
Leren ontwikkelen volgens de 3 tier methode. Refresh Media ontwikkelt op de manier zoals het wordt onderwezen aan de opleidingen die zijn aangesloten bij Encabo. Dit betekent MVC methode, Model, View en Controller en het maken van een UML.

Gewenste profiel:

Je kunt al PHP of JAVA programmeren
Je hebt kennis van databases en met name van MySQL
Je bent niet bang om te leren en opnieuw te moeten beginnen aan een project.

Wat bieden wij?

Wij bieden jou een leuke, zelfstandige stageplaats, waarin je veel kunt leren en waarin je de ruimte krijgt om jezelf te ontwikkelen. Geen dag is hetzelfde en je zult veel contacten leggen. Je komt te werken in een enthousiast, dynamisch, ervaren en collegiaal team. Hiernaast krijg jij deruimte om aan jouw (school) opdracht te werken.

Leer de organisatie kennen
Het bedrijf is gespecialiseerd in het ontwerp, de constructie, de samenbouw en de installatie van handling systemen. Wij bieden klantgerichte, turnkey oplossingen op basis van gestandaardiseerde technologie. wij richten ons wereldwijd op de voedingsmiddelen, farmaceutische en broederij industrie.
Over de functie
De functie van Software Project Engineer is een veelzijdige rol. Samen met je collega Project Engineers voor Mechanisch en Elektro, bedenk je het totaal ontwerp voor een installatie. Daarnaast stuur je de software engineers aan die werkzaam zijn binnen het project en heb je regelmatig afstemming met de project manager en met de klant. Ten behoeve van de klantacceptatie en de inbedrijfstelling van een installatie ben je regelmatig onsite bij een klant te vinden. Concreet betekent dit dat je ongeveer 30% van je werktijd aan het werk zult zijn bij onze klanten wereldwijd.
Kortom, je bent verantwoordelijk voor:
Het softwarematige ontwerp binnen het project
Realisatie van project planning software
Budget- planning en bewaking
Aansturing en bijsturing van engineers
In- en externe communicatie over voortgang
Gedeelde verantwoordelijkheid voor inbedrijfstelling installatie onsite
Benodigde competenties
Teamspeler, resultaatgericht, plannen en organiseren, leidinggeven, klantgericht, goede communicatieve vaardigheden, daadkracht.
Jouw kwaliteiten
HBO opleiding Industriële Automatisering of Elektrotechniek
Aantoonbare ervaring (min. 3 jaar) in de machinebouw
Beheersing van Allen Bradley Control-logix
Bij voorkeur beheersing van Siemens S7
Uitstekende kennis van de Nederlandse taal
Goede kennis van de Engelse taal en, bij voorkeur, een tweede vreemde taal
De voordelen
Wij bieden jou dus een volwaardige en uitdagende functie in het hogere segment van de markt waarbij je profiteert van een veelzijdige en veeleisende klantengroep. Je wordt betrokken in alle fases van een project en krijgt de gelegenheid om jouw bijdrage ook daadwerkelijk live in actie terug te zien. Uiteraard ontvang je voor je inspanningen een passende beloning op basis van de CAO van de Klein Metaal.
Klinkt goed?
Ben jij geïnteresseerd in bovenstaand profiel? Good Company ziet graag jouw sollicitatie tegemoet! Solliciteer via onze website op de vacature van Software Project Engineer.
